manager confirmed that Yarmolenko, Winston Reid and Carlos Sanchez will not return this season and there is a doubt on Jack Wilshere.
He told the press pack “Andriy Yarmolenko, Winston Reid and Carlos Sanchez will not be back this season. Jack Wilshere, I have some doubts if he will be ready, so we have some players who will not be ready to play before the end of the season.”
On Lanzini he said: “We hope that Manu Lanzini will be ready for Fulham , at least for the bench, if he continues working over the next two weeks, and Fabian Balbuena could be back in a couple of weeks.”
